poem:
**Armchair Heroes**

In flickering blue, the world revolves—
athletes cross oceans to leap and vault.
We recline, remote in hand,
empires of cushions, cheer from afar,
through miles of fiberoptic thread,
hearts synchronizing, muscle tensing,
as Julien Alfred defies gravity
and we, in stillness, share his wings.
